data.what_is:
We are glad to announce that we are now a Salesforce Gold Consulting Partner and a Salesforce Talent Alliance Member. Algoworks is a B2B IT services provider company that has expertise in key areas of Salesforce CRM and Mobility, including Software Product Engineering. 
Being a Salesforce Consulting Partner/ISV Partner and rated 5.0/5.0 on AppExchange, we provide clients with access to our Salesforce experts for their administrative and development needs, be it customizing SFDC to business processes, integrating it with third-party systems, upgrading to lightning experience and Force.com App Development.
data.product_description: Algoworks is a global outsourced IT Services company and our business is to make the offshore strategy work for ISVs and software enabled companies.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Algoworks?
It's services, it provides lot of services

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
There is nothing to dislike about it, there developers are quite good

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's a one of the top digital transform company, it offers services in Salesforce, web technologies development

initial_reviews.review_title: Best in the Industry for App Development
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Algoworks helped in website and app development. They provide an end-to-end solution which translates into giving the task to them and forgetting as they will come back with outstanding solutions.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
The customer support offered by them was rock solid. They accounted for our requests and made necessary changes as and when needed. Keeping the customer's needs a priority made us feel valued.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
The time taken by the team was a bit high, but in the end, the quality justified the duration. We were pretty satisfied with the result, so we do not have many complaints.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our team lacks the technical and coding skills required to develop and operate apps and websites. These shortcomings were taken care of by the team. Even after the end of the project, their continued support is highly appreciated.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
We partnered with Algoworks in a bid to outsource a client project.
Our client was a media company that needed to re-evaluate their marketing workflows and needed some automation on the Marketing Cloud in that regard. We followed and researched a few companies with a dedicated team of consultants and specialists for Salesforce Marketing Cloud projects. We found Algoworks and the customer testimonials showed their expertise in that direction.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Algoworks was very forthcoming in how they were going to approach the project and there were no hidden costs.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
Absolutely nothing. They are an awesome team.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our clients were very happy and based on their reviews, we have generated many new leads. The client business multiplied many folds due to better marketing they have been able to do with the help of solutions provided by Algoworks. The manual work of client's employees has been decreased to the minimal amount with the help of automation solution designed by Algoworks.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
We contacted Algoworks for implementation around Salesforce CPQ. We wanted to streamline the revenue visibility for one of our clients.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
We found Algoworks as the most popular Salesforce consultant on AppExchange, and now we know why. They have an impeccable understanding of the subject matter and approach the project with razor-sharp intelligence.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
They were great. Nothing to dislike at all.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
They are an awesome team. They met each and every expectation. You'll be happy with the results.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a services company and needed Salesforce implementation on a client project regarding CPQ. We found Algoworks as the Most Popular Salesforce consultant on AppExchange, so we contacted them. We needed to streamline revenue visibility and quote configuration, functionality to be integrated into the workflow.
Algoworks did a great job and our clients were happy with the value they received. We have been able to maintain a long-term relationship with our client, so, a win there as well.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Algoworks helped us to integrate Salesforce onto our existing community software platform. They discovered a lot of gaps and performed a major code inspection. They also identified new features that enhanced the efficiency of the platform.

The team resolved diverse issues with our database in addition to handling new module development. The project was completed as per the scheduled timeline, with major releases at an unprecedented pace, enabling the product to go live fast. We were impressed with their high-quality code.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
The best thing I found was the level of detail with which they planned the implementation.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
Nothing at all.
Even as we tried to ramp it up, they quickly adapted to our expectations and the team was always flexible.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
Please go ahead. They are an awesome team and can scale your projects so  efficiently that you may not have envisioned yourself. We liked working with this enthusiastic lot.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
We worked with them to build some Salesforce integration into our existing system. Being a community of Salesforce experts, we wanted to develop a system that could provide guidance to our visitors on how to choose the right solution and the right team to work with. The problems were solved using Community Cloud in a way that we're glad to have discovered while working with them.

They also created a roadmap for us, so that we could scale it up and customize it further in the future, which was unique.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
We discovered Algoworks through their blog on technical integrations on a Salesforce community platform. We enlisted their help for an e-commerce integration solution and have been working continuously with them since.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
I've never encountered a scenario where they weren't able to help or find a suitable solution.
Their flexibility and creativity in finding solutions is impressive.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
Algoworks has proved to be a wonderful technology partner. There isn't a single thing to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
Yes, their flexibility and creativity in finding solutions is impressive.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
Algoworks provided us with a custom Salesforce integration solution with WooCommerce and PayPal.
They helped us realize more potential and opportunities across the e-commerce platform.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Mobile development for a startup in stealth mode.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
It was pleasant working with them.  They are very well organized. They received my product requirements and did a great job breaking down and understanding every product features.  The estimates were reasonable. Then they proceeded to create milestones and sprints.  As far as technical skills, they can handle it.  Everyday I received an update via Basecamp.  Manish Attri was the project lead and did a great job sticking to my schedule and helped clear up any confusion.  I was happy with the output and would use them again.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
Nothing at the moment. There's always ups and downs but we worked together to remedy the problems that come up.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
To get the best estimate, make sure you create a well detail product requirement document.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was looking for a mobile development shop that could help me build my dating event app.  They are great at execution and problem solving.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great company to work with.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Algoworks helped us build an amazing eCommerce platform. The team's capability to cater to the minute technicalities that went into the project is praise-worthy. They offered easy integration with Salesforce, easy customization, and great consultation services.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
They have awesome work ethics and house an amazing technical team.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
There is nothing to dislike about Algoworks

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
Highly recommended

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
They helped us tackle a big problem that we were facing which was to set up Analytics and drive relative insights. they also helped with an easy customization process.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the best team I worked with
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Algoworks helped us to migrate from our old CRM  software to Salesforce. We were stuck with an old customer relationship management software for quite a long time and were looking to upgrade it or migrate to some other better option. Algoworks did the job for us.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Team Algoworks was very helpful on every step of the project, they were always available to consult us and suggest the best suitable solutions. The project was completed within the given time-frame and they were totally in-budget too. I visited the office of Algoworks  once and I would love to say that these people are very friendly.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
I can't think of anything that I dislike about Algoworks.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
We highly recommend Algoworks to all the companies who want to get services around Salesforce.

What problems is Algoworks solving and how is that benefiting you?
We worked on CRM migration with Algoworks and these people were really co-operative. After the migration we have experienced many positive changes in our customer relationship management. Algoworks completed the project within the expected time-frame and the service was excellent too.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
its helped our team track and maintain our circuits records tied to our vendors

What do you like best about Algoworks?
its fairly comprehensive.  I haven't heard anyone from our team having negative things to say about the service or their experiences they've had

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
none so far, the PO  is usually the person who receives feedback but I haven't heard anything

initial_reviews.review_title: An amazing development company to work with!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
A platform for people interested in learning about Salesforce, sharing ideas around it, and building a strong community of Salesforce lovers. It is a forum, a blog/infographic/video posting platform, and an app showcasing portal, all in one place.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
They met deadlines and worked efficiently to deliver the project. Their task managing skills are amazing. They are always ready with robust solutions and are well versed with the technologies that we needed help in. We had a spectacular experience with Algoworks and would love to work with them in the future.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
I did not find anything worth disliking about the company. It is hard to point out mistakes when a team is hard working and honest. I had one of the best experiences with them.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
Algoworks has a highly responsible team. They are almost always available to communicate with you. They deliver their work within deadline and give a spectacular experience. The proactive members of the team made it easy to come up with accurate solutions. They are honest and accountable people to work with.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great company to work with!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
We hired Algoworks for one of our clients who needed help in allowing their customers to connect their Salesforce instance with their main billing platform.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Algoworks has a skilled team. They have immense knowledge of the domain. The way they understood the requirement with such ease was applaudable.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
There was nothing to dislike, we had good experience with them.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
I will highly recommend Algoworks because they provide quick support.

initial_reviews.review_title: Experienced mobile app development at a fair price
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
We were looking to implement a small application that allowed our internal employees check pertinent information about our operations. We worked with Algoworks to create just an app. They were extremely helpful throughout the entire process and was able to deliver to us a mobile app that met all of our expectations.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
The best part about Algoworks is their commitment to the customer. Everyone we worked with was extremely friendly and guided us through the entire process. All of our questions were answered and they made sure we were always kept abreast of any changes or developments.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
The only part we disliked was the time-frame it took to complete the project. However, we definitely understand that they are extremely busy and may not be able to commit to an aggressive timeline.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
I highly recommend giving Algoworks a try. They are a great company!

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Algoworks provided end-to-end design and development for a new platform that was seeking to launch an MVP product to generate crowdfunding interest.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Communication is the most important thing since we are an offshore company, and Algoworks has been fantastic in that regard.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
We have only worked with them for a month, so it is the early days, but so far I cannot say if there is a need for improvement. Nothing comes to mind. I'm really happy with their communication and quality of work. There have been a couple of variations in the way that I was going along with things, and they have been accommodating without any extra cost. So far, it's been a great journey.

initial_reviews.review_title: A Great opportunity to with the company
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Algoworks has a great team which provides on-time delivery, great support and meets delivery deadlines. They are ready with concrete solutions and have a great team to work with. It is a thrilling experience for the team and company.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Algoworks is sincere and dedicated to work with my company from the start. They have always met deadlines and are proactive to solve problems.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
From my experience, I feel there is nothing that is to be disliked about the company. It had made deliveries in time and had the best support.

initial_reviews.review_title: Had a fantastic experience working with Algoworks!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
One of our clients, who is a healthcare service provider, needed a Salesforce community based web and mobile solution. They wanted a web portal that was user friendly, and wanted to connect physicians, patients, corporations and insurance providers associated with them on a single platform.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Algoworks has a great working environment. Their way of managing tasks is amazing. We never faced any delay of work from their side. They are hard working people and their work reflects professionalism.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
Nothing. Working with them was a great experience.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
I would highly recommend Algoworks for their quality of work.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
We hired Algoworks for a construction company who wanted Inventory management, quote management and document management through Salesforce. As they were using a software already, they needed added capabilities in their solution to interact intelligently and in real time.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
The team manages projects amazingly and their way of working is great. They delivered our project in time. They are very hardworking and honest people.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
I did not dislike anything. No complaints from Algoworks at all.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
Highly recommended company. Their way of working and managing projects is appreciable.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great service, had an amazing experience!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Our client who is a telecommunication service provider was using SharePoint as a content management tool, and Microsoft 365 suite for calculating quotes, generating proposal, and creating invoices. They needed a single solution to accomplish all the tasks on a same platform and reduce the count of number-of-actions-per-process for all their business processes. They also wanted a platform to keep track of their potential opportunities and relationships with current customers.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
They have extensive knowledge and know how to manage such complicated projects.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
I did not find any flaw and was very happy with the project. Nothing to dislike.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
Algoworks is highly recommended from my side. They are great with Salesforce projects.

Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
Our client wanted to speed up their lead gathering process. They were using NetSuite as their original CRM platform since they were more interested in NetSuite's resource management capabilities.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
They are very skilled in their work. They carry immense knowledge of the domain.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
Everything was perfect about Algoworks. Didn't dislike anything.

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
I highly recommend Algoworks to everyone. Had a great time working with them.

initial_reviews.review_title: One of the best companies to work with!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Algoworks helped with:
My client, an E-Commerce company, was already using Salesforce for tracking their customer leads. They were using a separate computer telephony system to call their customers. They needed an integrated solution to keep track of their leads and for receiving and sending calls to these leads.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
Algoworks has great management skills. They are punctual with project delivery.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
There is nothing to dislike about Algoworks. They were perfect!

Recommendations to others considering Algoworks:
I highly recommend Algoworks to others. Had a good experience with them.

They are provinding performance testing support.

What do you like best about Algoworks?
They provide great service and support throughout the process.

What do you dislike about Algoworks?
